meta-review.comment: Dead Island 2 is a blood-soaked, zombie-slaying romp that delivers on the promise of mindless, gory fun. Dambuster Studios has resurrected the franchise with improved gameplay, diverse weapons, and an abundance of undead carnage. While the game may stumble in a few places, the sheer joy of smashing, splatting, and slicing hordes of zombies makes Dead Island 2 a thrilling experience for fans of the genre. So grab your weapons and prepare for a wild ride through the zombie apocalypse!
